name: Green Python
description: Green Python is an indica-dominant strain bred by House of Funk Genetics that was created by cross-pollinating Burmese (from Bodhi Seeds) with a Green Crack clone. The resulting hybrid is full-bodied and known for its fast flowering cycle. The bite from Green Python is a blend of balanced effects that incite cerebral energy with a calm, relaxed body.
attributes_title: Sleepy, Euphoric, Happy, Relaxed, Tingly, Eye Pressure, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Muscle Spasms, Pain, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes
